testcase.classname: US_014 Doctor should see all test results.
testcase.name: US_014_TC_001 Physician should be able to see all test details
testcase.system-out: Given user-physician is on "medunna_url" page...............................passed When user-physician click on user icon......................................passed And user-physician click on Sign In option..................................passed And user-physician enter "DoctorTom" in username input......................passed And user-physician enter "33221Tt5%*" in password input.....................passed And user-physician click on Remember Me check box...........................passed And user-physician click on Sign In submit button...........................passed And user-physician click on MyPages.........................................passed And user-physician click on My Appointments.................................passed And user-physician click on Edit button.....................................passed Then verify Show Test Results button is displayed on the site...............passed Then close the application..................................................passed
